field.component:
{"settings":{"minWidth":800,"minHeight":200,"default":"

Using this form:

  1. Remove the default value from the Entry ID field. This should be set either in-process by workflow, or via URL.
  2. Add any field belonging to the metadata template you are trying to update to the form
  3. Add the class 'new-metadata' to the field
  4. Any fields you want to be readonly, either pass it in the array in the JavaScript or use field rules to disable it.
    1. Do NOT make the field readonly in the properties pane as this will block JavaScript from setting its value
","padding":10,"id":"9ad7bf3c-0ed8-42d0-b4ea-5bfa2544226f","componentType":"CustomHTML","fieldId":10,"parentId":"564e7575-9d23-4c58-b818-5440174a671b","isInCollection":false,"isInTable":false,"collectionId":null,"tableId":null,"isPreviousDataPreserved":false,"ancestorReadonly":false},"styles":{}}

setting.title: Metadata

field.component:
{"settings":{"minWidth":800,"minHeight":200,"default":"

Using this form:

  1. Remove the default value from the Entry ID field. This should be set either in-process by workflow, or via URL.
  2. Add any field belonging to the metadata template you are trying to update to the form
  3. Add the class 'new-metadata' to the field
  4. Any fields you want to be readonly, either pass it in the array in the JavaScript or use field rules to disable it.
    1. Do NOT make the field readonly in the properties pane as this will block JavaScript from setting its value
  5. The form has mobile-optimizations disabled so it can be built to support the embedded width of the repository however you want.
","padding":10,"id":"f8f085cc-b53d-4814-8f9a-93ddf2a472cf","componentType":"CustomHTML","fieldId":10,"parentId":"564e7575-9d23-4c58-b818-5440174a671b","isInCollection":false,"isInTable":false,"collectionId":null,"tableId":null,"isPreviousDataPreserved":false,"cssClasses":"hidden","ancestorReadonly":false},"styles":{}}
